knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.subtitle: Comprehensive guide to plant diseases, symptoms, and treatments
diseases.lateBlight.name: Late Blight (Tomato & Potato)
diseases.lateBlight.symptoms: Dark brown spots on leaves, white mold on undersides, rapid leaf death
diseases.lateBlight.causes: Phytophthora infestans fungus, thrives in cool, wet conditions
diseases.lateBlight.treatment: Remove infected plants, apply copper-based fungicides, improve air circulation
diseases.lateBlight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering, ensure proper spacing
diseases.powderyMildew.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.powderyMildew.symptoms: White powdery coating on leaves, stunted growth, leaf curling
diseases.powderyMildew.causes: Various fungal species, favored by high humidity and moderate temperatures
diseases.powderyMildew.treatment: Neem oil, sulfur sprays, baking soda solution (1 tbsp per gallon)
diseases.powderyMildew.prevention: Adequate spacing, prune infected areas, water in morning
diseases.rustDiseases.name: Rust Diseases
diseases.rustDiseases.symptoms: Orange, yellow or brown pustules on leaf undersides
diseases.rustDiseases.causes: Rust fungi, spreads via wind-borne spores
diseases.rustDiseases.treatment: Remove infected leaves, apply fungicides like mancozeb or chlorothalonil
diseases.rustDiseases.prevention: Crop rotation, resistant varieties, remove plant debris
diseases.bacterialSpot.name: Bacterial Spot
diseases.bacterialSpot.symptoms: Small dark spots with yellow halos, leaf drop, fruit lesions
diseases.bacterialSpot.causes: Xanthomonas bacteria, spread by water splash and contaminated tools
diseases.bacterialSpot.treatment: Copper-based bactericides, remove severely infected plants
diseases.bacterialSpot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead irrigation, sanitize tools
diseases.fireBlight.name: Fire Blight
diseases.fireBlight.symptoms: Blackened branches appearing burnt, oozing cankers, wilting flowers
diseases.fireBlight.causes: Erwinia amylovora bacteria, enters through flowers and wounds
diseases.fireBlight.treatment: Prune infected branches 12 inches below damage, apply streptomycin sprays
diseases.fireBlight.prevention: Prune during dry weather, avoid excess nitrogen fertilizer
diseases.bacterialWilt.name: Bacterial Wilt
diseases.bacterialWilt.symptoms: Sudden wilting despite adequate water, vascular browning
diseases.bacterialWilt.causes: Ralstonia solanacearum, transmitted by insects and contaminated soil
diseases.bacterialWilt.treatment: No cure - remove and destroy infected plants immediately
diseases.bacterialWilt.prevention: Crop rotation, control cucumber beetles, use resistant varieties
diseases.tomatoMosaic.name: Tomato Mosaic Virus
diseases.tomatoMosaic.symptoms: Mottled light and dark green patterns, leaf distortion, reduced fruit
diseases.tomatoMosaic.causes: Tobacco mosaic virus family, highly stable, spread by contact
diseases.tomatoMosaic.treatment: No cure - remove infected plants, sanitize tools and hands
diseases.tomatoMosaic.prevention: Use resistant varieties, wash hands after smoking, disinfect tools
diseases.cucumberMosaic.name: Cucumber Mosaic Virus
diseases.cucumberMosaic.symptoms: Yellow mosaic patterns, stunted growth, deformed fruit
diseases.cucumberMosaic.treatment: Remove infected plants, control aphid populations
diseases.cucumberMosaic.prevention: Use reflective mulches, eliminate aphid-attracting weeds
diseases.leafCurl.name: Leaf Curl Virus
diseases.leafCurl.symptoms: Upward curling leaves, yellowing, stunted plant growth
diseases.leafCurl.causes: Whitefly-transmitted virus, common in warm climates
diseases.leafCurl.treatment: Remove infected plants, control whitefly with neem oil
diseases.leafCurl.prevention: Use yellow sticky traps, plant resistant varieties
diseases.nitrogenDeficiency.name: Nitrogen Deficiency
diseases.nitrogenDeficiency.symptoms: Yellowing of older leaves (chlorosis), stunted growth, pale plants
diseases.nitrogenDeficiency.causes: Insufficient nitrogen in soil, heavy rain leaching, high carbon mulch
diseases.nitrogenDeficiency.treatment: Apply nitrogen-rich fertilizers (urea, ammonium nitrate), compost
diseases.nitrogenDeficiency.prevention: Regular soil testing, balanced fertilization, use cover crops
diseases.ironDeficiency.name: Iron Deficiency (Chlorosis)
diseases.ironDeficiency.symptoms: Yellowing between leaf veins (interveinal chlorosis) on young leaves
diseases.ironDeficiency.causes: High soil pH, excess phosphorus, poor drainage
diseases.ironDeficiency.treatment: Apply iron chelates, sulfur to lower pH, improve drainage
diseases.ironDeficiency.prevention: Maintain proper soil pH (6.0-6.5), avoid over-liming
diseases.calciumDeficiency.name: Calcium Deficiency (Blossom End Rot)
diseases.calciumDeficiency.symptoms: Dark, sunken spots on fruit bottom, especially tomatoes and peppers
diseases.calciumDeficiency.causes: Inconsistent watering, high soil salts, rapid plant growth
diseases.calciumDeficiency.treatment: Apply calcium nitrate, ensure consistent watering schedule
diseases.calciumDeficiency.prevention: Mulch to maintain moisture, avoid excess nitrogen
